member.name: M:BOZHON.TSAMO.DBHelper.DbContext`1.Query``1(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: 查询数据
member.typeparam: 对象类型
member.param: SQL语句

参数：
1. 基本类型数组。例如：("select ... Id = @p0 and Name = @p1", new object[] { 123, "frank" })
2. (匿名)实体对象。例如：("select ... Id = @Id and Name = @Name", model)
或：("select ... Id = @Id and Name = @Name", new { Id = 123, Name = "frank" })
3. 实体对象数组（实现了IEnumerable）。例如：("select ... Id = @Id and Name = @Name", new[] { model1, model2 })
4. 动态参数（IEnumerable[KeyValuePair[string, object]]）

member.name: M:BOZHON.TSAMO.DBHelper.Sql.ConvertToDapperParam(System.Object)
member.summary:
将DapperPoco支持SQL参数格式转换为Dapper的SQL参数格式。
DapperPoco支持的参数格式如下： 1. 基本类型数组。例如：("select ... Id = @p0 and Name = @p1", new object[] { 123, "frank" }) 2. (匿名)实体对象。例如：("select ... Id = @Id and Name = @Name", model) 或：("select ... Id = @Id and Name = @Name", new { Id = 123, Name = "frank" }) 3. 实体对象数组（实现了IEnumerable）。例如：("select ... Id = @Id and Name = @Name", new[] { model1, model2 }) 4. 动态参数（IEnumerable[KeyValuePair[string, object]]）。
member.param: DapperPoco支持SQL参数

member.name: P:Dapper.SqlMapper.Settings.UseSingleResultOptimization
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Dapper should use the CommandBehavior.SingleResult optimization
member.remarks: Note that a consequence of enabling this option is that errors that happen after the first select may not be reported

member.name: P:Dapper.SqlMapper.Settings.UseSingleRowOptimization
member.summary: Gets or sets whether Dapper should use the CommandBehavior.SingleRow optimization
member.remarks: Note that on some DB providers this optimization can have adverse performance impact

member.name: M:Dapper.SqlMapper.Settings.SetDefaults
member.summary: Resets all Settings to their default values

member.name: P:Dapper.SqlMapper.Settings.CommandTimeout
member.summary: Specifies the default Command Timeout for all Queries

member.name: P:Dapper.SqlMapper.Settings.ApplyNullValues
member.summary: Indicates whether nulls in data are silently ignored (default) vs actively applied and assigned to members

member.name: P:Dapper.SqlMapper.Settings.PadListExpansions
member.summary: Should list expansions be padded with null-valued parameters, to prevent query-plan saturation? For example, an 'in @foo' expansion with 7, 8 or 9 values will be sent as a list of 10 values, with 3, 2 or 1 of them null. The padding size is relative to the size of the list; "next 10" under 150, "next 50" under 500, "next 100" under 1500, etc.
member.remarks: Caution: this should be treated with care if your DB provider (or the specific configuration) allows for null equality (aka "ansi nulls off"), as this may change the intent of your query; as such, this is disabled by default and must be enabled.

member.name: P:Dapper.SqlMapper.Settings.InListStringSplitCount
member.summary: If set (non-negative), when performing in-list expansions of integer types ("where id in @ids", etc), switch to a string_split based operation if there are more than this many elements. Note that this feautre requires SQL Server 2016 / compatibility level 130 (or above).
